channel.title: muscle building Podcast
channel.description: A Free podcast for exercise, strength training,bodybuilding,muscle building,weight training people who want to improve there lifestyle.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Educating Informing and entertaining you
channel.itunes:author: kevin redman
channel.itunes:summary: A Free podcast for exercise, strength training,bodybuilding,muscle building,weight training people who want to improve there lifestyle.

item.title: Episode 8 The joys of High Intensity Interval Training(HIIT)
item.description: In this episode I explain the benefits of incorperating a HIIT workout in your training plan. The two links to the article are below http://www.musclebuildingover40.com/articles-on-weight-training/yes-cardiovascular-workouts-are-essential-to-good-health/hiit-training-are-you-really-doing-it-correctly-probably-not/ http://www.musclebuildingover40.com/articles-on-weight-training/yes-cardiovascular-workouts-are-essential-to-good-health/hiit-training-are-you-really-doing-it-correctly-probably-not/ultimate-cardio-tool-for-conditioning/
item.dc:creator: kevin redman

item.title: Episode 7 Sleeping Eating Training
item.description: In this episode I talk about why sleeping eating and training must be done correctly in order to get any benefits. I also talk a little bit more about myself and have a short interview with selika one of the fitness contestants in the miami pro bodybuilding and fitness show I attended last week. http://www.musclebuildingover40.com/
item.dc:creator: kevin redman

item.title: Episode 6 muscle building over 40 at miami pro bodybuilding show
item.description: Hi this podcast is a little different then my regular ones. In this one I interview two of the competitors Dwayne and chris I also interview Stacy who owns a really good site where you can get all your posing outfits made to measure(please mention your came from my podcast)website details down below. I will be adding more interviews next week and if you check my site (details below}over the next week will be adding videos and photos of the show http://www.harlequinworkshop.co.uk/ http://www.musclebuildingover40.com/
item.dc:creator: kevin redman

item.title: Episode 5 The benefits of High-intensity interval training
item.description: In this episode I talk about the benefits of High-intensity interval training I also have a interview with a good friend of mine her name is brenda and she started training at 48 and has ran in 10k runs. I also mention the fitness and bodybuilding show I will be attending on 01/04/2012 http://miamiproevents.co.uk/index.php. To read my two article on HIIT head over to my website http://www.musclebuildingover40.com/

item.title: Episode 4 The Importance of A Personal Trainer
item.description: In this episode I ask is a personal trainer importent to reach your goals. I also talk about the show I will be attending at london excel on 17-18 march google http://www.grandprixexpo.co.uk/ for more details.
item.dc:creator: kevin redman

item.title: Episode 3 The Importance of getting the correct split routine.
item.description: In this episode I talk about the Importance of getting the correct split routine. I also talk about the bodybuilding show I will be attending on the 19-20 march. More information at http://www.grandprixexpo.co.uk/default.asp and a passing comment about the olympics which are being held five miles from where I live.

item.title: Episode 2 why cardio is a importent part of your program
item.description: In this episode I explain why including a cardiovascular program is a must in any weight training program. Plus I talk about my journey from being fit to being over weight to being fit again. I also explain how I would love the audiance to get involved. Remember to check out my website at http://www.musclebuildingover40.com/
item.dc:creator: kevin redman
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Age is Just a number Episode 1
item.description: Hi all you mature people welcome to the first of many (I hope) podcasts where I will give advice seek advice and talk about the benefits of training when you are over the dreaded 40.
item.dc:creator: kevin redman
